input-field.name: liveActivationCode
input-field.label: Activation code
input-field.helpText: Insert the six characters activation code from Online Shop section on Satispay Dashboard. Save configuration to enable the 'Activate' button.

input-field.name: sandboxActivationCode
input-field.label: Activation code (sandbox)
input-field.helpText: Insert the six characters sandbox activation code from Online Shop section on Satispay Dashboard. Save configuration to enable the 'Activate' button.

input-field.name: scheduledTask
input-field.label: Enable scheduled task to finalize unhandled payments
input-field.helpText: Enable a scheduled task that finalize unhandled payments.

input-field.name: timeFrame
input-field.label: Time frame
input-field.helpText: Specify the time frame for the payments to be handled. Min value is 2 hours.
